name: Collision Course
description: You crash into the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. Make a melee attack roll, dealing 4d4 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
If the target is vulnurable to this damage, the damage is increased by MOVE.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
